issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The vectorization validation codepath should treat the existing operator tree as immutable, so that the VectorizerCannotVectorizeException does not have to undo any changes to the operator tree when caught.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Delay out-of-tree fixups till whole work is vectorized

comments.body:
Seems to have gotten lost in builds.apache. 

Reattaching patch for test again.

+1 LGTM, pending tests.

I ran tests for Tez and MR with the second patch. They all passed.

The q.out contains results after HIVE-18713, remove that patch and regen q.out
